answers.answer: Hi, first get the thyroxin levels (T3, T4, and TSH) checked up, may be it the time to adjust dose of thyroxin. If reports are fine, do consult neurologist

question: I went to emergency feeling extreme weakness for me I was so exhausted without exertion. I was just driving home from a freinds house and felt like I was too tired to finish driving home  like someone just pulled a plug and drained my energy this was different than I am tired from work my arms felt weak and my legs drained. I was extremely tired and slept This is not the first time I have felt like this before but lately it is increasing in length and I think my left eye is weakening and when I get these spells I get a little weak in my voice also like I dont have enough strength to talk and i almost feel like Im muddled headed. I went to er and they said maybe my synthroid 5o might be a little low I have been diagnosed with hypo thyroidism and I weigh 200 lbs and 5'2 inches bp norm146/96  pulse is 72 a little anemic My blood sugar stay around 110 in the morning I am also checking blood for diabetes mellitus although it has not been over 165 in a while My memory has become an issue at work I dont remember things very quickly like I will forget who I talk to yesterday or if I had sexs with my husband yesterday I think that is different than forgetting who you spoke with at work Please tell should I go see a neurologist or not waste my time maybe I have turned in to hypochondriac Sharon
title: Why would the emergency doctor say maybe check out by neurologist
